meanings.definition: The quality of being friendly and pleasant.
meanings.sent1: Her amiablenesses made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the amiablenesses of our neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of amiablenesses, making it a joyous occasion.
meanings.sent4: His amiablenesses were like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's amiablenesses brightened up the classroom.

meanings.definition: The state of having a pleasant and agreeable nature.
meanings.sent1: The amiablenesses of the park create a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: She exudes natural amiablenesses wherever she goes.
meanings.sent3: The amiablenesses of the puppy melted everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent4: The amiablenesses of the old bookstore welcomed all who entered.
meanings.sent5: His amiablenesses were like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
